projects.title: Trumemo
projects.description: A robust healthcare management system for agencies supporting individuals with developmental disabilities. Features comprehensive patient data management, progress tracking, incident reports, behavior monitoring, and customizable care plan templates.

projects.title: Intralign
projects.description: A business development roadmap tool for strategic planning and operational alignment. Features an interactive timeline for visualizing and tracking strategic initiatives with robust collaboration features.

projects.title: Electra
projects.description: An AI-powered multi-agent business assistant platform. Features dynamic multi-step forms, advanced multi-field filtering, interactive data tables, and real-time WebSocket communication for live chat and agent interactions.

projects.title: Voyage Vite
projects.description: A web admin panel for property and vehicle rental operations. Features Google Maps integration for interactive search, robust multi-criteria filtering, user management with secure authentication, and real-time data synchronization.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, animated portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features smooth animations, dark theme, and responsive design.

projects.title: Real-time Dashboard
projects.description: A data visualization dashboard with real-time updates, interactive charts, and customizable widgets. Designed for analytics and monitoring.
